com.navis.framework.presentation.charting

Interface IChart

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EChart
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractChart, BarChart, BulletChart, GaugeChart, LineChart, PieChart, ScatterPlotChart, StackedBarChart

    public interface IChart
extends EChart
    This interface adds functionality to the external interface EChart. Its methods are used by the XML parsing engine.
    Author:
    Gisella Saavedra, Jun 23, 2011

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      • setGraphVisualAidElement

        void setGraphVisualAidElement(GraphVisualAidElementEnum inVisualAidElement,
                              java.lang.Boolean inDesired)
        Sets the presence or use of a graph visual aid element.
        Parameters:
        inVisualAidElement - visual aid type
        inDesired - true if desired; false, otherwise. False is default if not specified.
